# WooCommerce Invoice Manager

### MONEY-BACK

---

All our products have a 30-day money-back guarantee.

![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/refund.png)

 

### FULL-REFUND

---

Not happy with our products? Get a full refund within 24 hours. No questions asked!

![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/woocommerce-invoice-manager-gutenberg-blocks.png)

 

## Gutenberg Blocks

This plugin provides a set of custom Gutenberg blocks, streamlining invoice customization with simple adjustments to colors, fonts, and spacing. Achieve brand consistency effortlessly with full design control, transforming invoice creation into a refined, style-conscious process.

#### Company Data Block

Outlines your company’s info to promote transparency and brand identity.

#### Billing Data Block

Captures customer billing details for accuracy and communication.

#### Order Items Block

Details order items and prices for a complete purchase overview.

#### Order Customer Note Block

Allocates space for customer notes, adding personal touches to invoices.

![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/woocommerce-invoice-manager-gutenberg-color-palette.png)

 

## Gutenberg Editor

Powered by the Gutenberg editor’s capabilities this plugin offers an intuitive interface for real-time and drag-and-drop editing experience.

#### Color palette

Use any color palette to mach your brands style.

#### Company information

Use company and logo blocks.

#### Order information

Include and customize any order details.

## Real-Time Preview

In the Invoice Editor, we’ve included an order selection feature that lets you to choose a real order as a placeholder for an accurate preview of the final invoice, ensuring precision and consistency in your presentations.

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/woocommerce-invoice-manager-gutenberg-editor.png)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/woocommerce-invoice-manager-gutenberg-editor.png)

 

![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/woocommerce-invoice-manager-order-metabox.png)

 

## Admin dashboard

Include invoices actions in your orders list table and order admin view.

#### Order status

Automatically generate invoices upon order status updates (Processing/Completed), streamlining billing.

#### Invoice metabox

Include the invoices metabox inside order admin panel to manage order invoices and emails.

[View documentation](https://quadlayers.com/documentation/woocommerce-invoice-manager/)

![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/woocommerce-invoice-manager-my-account-orders.png)

 

## Add invoice to    
my account order

Display invoices directly in the user admin panel.

#### Attach Invoice PDF

Include a PDF version of the invoice as an attachment in emails, offering customers a convenient and printable format for their records.

#### Attach Invoice Download Link

Provide a download link for the invoice within the email, allowing customers easy access to their invoice from any device without needing an attachment.

![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/woocommerce-invoice-manager-emails.png)

 

## Invoice Emails

Effortlessly manage your invoicing communication with our comprehensive email features.

#### Include Invoice in New Order Email

Automatically append the invoice to the new order confirmation email sent to customers, providing them with detailed transaction documentation from the outset.

#### Send Invoice Email on Creation

Trigger a dedicated invoice email to the customer immediately upon the creation of the invoice, ensuring prompt delivery of billing information.

#### Attach Invoice PDF

Include a PDF version of the invoice as an attachment in emails, offering customers a convenient and printable format for their records.

#### Attach Invoice Download Link

Provide a download link for the invoice within the email, allowing customers easy access to their invoice from any device without needing an attachment.

![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/woocommerce-invoice-manager-settings.png)

 

## More features

Enhance your invoicing process with additional features designed for efficiency and customization.

#### Disable for Free Orders

Opt out of invoice generation for zero-cost orders, focusing on revenue transactions.

#### Delete Invoice Option

Manage invoice deletion preferences, ensuring data integrity or facilitating removal when needed.

#### Reset Sequence Annually

Automatically restart invoice numbering each year for organized financial records.

#### Sequence Prefix & Suffix

Customize invoice numbers with unique identifiers for enhanced tracking and compliance.

[View documentation](https://quadlayers.com/documentation/woocommerce-invoice-manager/)

## Tools

Explore additional tools to further enhance your invoicing bulk process and maintain seamless financial management.

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/woocommerce-invoice-manager-tools.png)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/woocommerce-invoice-manager-tools.png)

 

[Documentation](https://quadlayers.com/documentation/woocommerce-invoice-manager/)[Download free](https://quadlayers.com/checkout/?add-to-cart=85580&variation_id=118556)

## Content creation

Experience automation like never before. Set parameters, prompt the AI, and watch as AI Copilot crafts content that resonates with your audience.

#### Create any post type

Flexible creation for various content types.

#### Review any post type

Enhance content quality across posts.

## Editor toolkit

Elevate your editing directly within the text editor toolbar, where AI Copilot integrates advanced features like seamless translation, precise correction, and effective SEO optimization.

#### Integration with Gutenberg

Flawless integration with Gutenberg, enhancing editor functionality and user experience.

#### Integration with Classic Editor

Complete, seamless compatibility with Classic Editor, ensuring traditional workflow efficiency.

#### Integration with WooCommerce

content templates

#### Style settings

knowledge base

This transparent tracking feature ensures efficient management of resources and facilitates informed decision-making regarding AI integration within your WordPress environment.

## Licenses    
for simple products

Includes support for simple WooCommerce products by just activating the license checkbox.

#### Activate licenses on simple products

You can include a license on any simple product by just activating the license checkbox.

#### Config your license

You’ll be able to config your licenses based on an extensive settings panel. To find out more about the license options, please check our documentation [here](https://quadlayers.com/documentation/woocommerce-license-manager/products/).

#### Automatic updates

Enable or disable automatic updates and allow your plugin users to receive automatic updates through their WordPress dashboard.

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/woocommerce-licenses-manager-product-variable-upgrade.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/woocommerce-licenses-manager-product-variable-upgrade.jpg)

 

## Licenses    
for variable products

Includes support for variable WooCommerce products by just activating the license checkbox.

#### Activate license on variable products

You can include a license on any variable products by just activating the license checkbox.

#### Config each variation license

You’ll be able to config your license setting for each product variation. To find out more about the license options, please check our documentation [here](https://quadlayers.com/documentation/woocommerce-license-manager/products/).

#### Remove or ban licenses activations

You can manage all the activations related to the licenses in the order.

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/woocommerce-licenses-manager-order-edit.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/woocommerce-licenses-manager-order-edit.jpg)

 

## Manage licenses inside orders

Our licenses managment system allows you to edit the licenses settings directly inside its parent order.

#### Add edit or delete licenses

You can edit or remove existing licenses or create new licenses related to the order.

#### Edit each license settings

You can edit each license’s settings like expiration time, activations limit, or email requirement.

#### Remove or ban licenses activations

You can manage all the activations related to the licenses in the order.

 `User: demo. Pass: demo` 

 

[View demo](https://quadlayers.com/woocommerce-license-manager/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=shop_order)

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/img16.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/img16.jpg)

 

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/woocommerce-licenses-manager-wordpress-tab.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/woocommerce-licenses-manager-wordpress-tab.jpg)

with WordPress

#### Admin dashboard updates notification

You can allow our license client to display a notification in the admin dashboard when a new update is available,

#### Dashboard modal information

You can allow our license client to display modal information with the premium plugin features.

[View demo](https://quadlayers.com/woocommerce-license-manager/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=product)

Our plugin includes a new section called Licenses Keys where you'll be able to access the entire license database.

## Advanced report

Show fields based on parent field values and improve the checkout user experience.

#### Licenses created

Select the conditional parent field and hide the current field based on the parent value.

#### Activations created

Our system detects the parent field type and allows you select the value based on the available options.

WooCommerce Licenses Manager allows your users to easily renew their licenses directly through their accounts.

## Upgrade licenses

WooCommerce Licenses Manager allows your users to easily upgrade their licenses directly through their accounts.

#### Custom page with upgrade options

The users can upgrade their licenses between the variation options directly through their accounts.

#### Activate or deactivate upgrade options

Site admins are allowed to activate or deactivate each upgrade option and set a custom price.

[View demo](https://quadlayers.com/woocommerce-license-manager/product/variable-license-product/upgrade-license/personal-7e98a19d-4520-4d3f-8737-11d5a0488a6a/?attribute_pa_licenses=personal)

## Upgrade options

Admins can manage the upgrade options trought a very easy and intuitive panel.

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/woocommerce-licenses-manager-license-upgrade-settings.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/woocommerce-licenses-manager-license-upgrade-settings.jpg)

## Show licenses in the user account

You can include a section on the user account to display the licenses purchased by the user.

 `User: demo. Pass: demo` 

 

[View demo](https://quadlayers.com/woocommerce-license-manager/my-account/licenses/)

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/woocommerce-licenses-manager-license-api-rest.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/woocommerce-licenses-manager-license-api-rest.jpg)

 

## Rest API

The plugin includes Rest API with all the endpoints you need to control the licenses in your site.

#### Endpoint to manage licenses

Through the endpoint, you’ll be able to create, delete or update licenses.

#### Endpoint to manage activations

Through this endpoint, you’ll be able to create or delete license activations.

#### Endpoint to get product information

Through this endpoint, you’ll be able get all the product information.

[View documentation](https://quadlayers.com/documentation/woocommerce-license-manager/developer/api/)

## Autocomplete Orders

By default, WooCommerce will only automatically complete paid orders with virtual and downloadable products. Our plugin allows you extends this to all orders.

#### None

No orders will be automatically completed.

#### All Orders

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-billing-fields.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-billing-fields.jpg)

 

 

 

 

 

## Add new fields to checkout

Include custom fields to the checkout page in Billing, Shipping and Additional fields sections.

#### Billing fields section

Include or remove fields in billing field section.

#### Shipping fields section

Include or remove fields in shipping field section.

#### Additional fields section

Include additional fields section in the checkout form.

![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-add-field-fees.png)

 

## Add new fees to    
checkout

You can include fees to each custom or core field.

#### Add percentage or fixed fees

You can include a fixed or percentage fee to the checkout to any custom or core field.

#### Add fees to single options fields

You can include a fixed or percentage fee to each option of the select and radio fields.

#### Add fees to multiple options fields

You can include a fixed or percentage fee to each option of the multiselect and multicheckbox fields.

## Edit    
core fields

Our plugin allows you to edit core fields in the Billing and Shipping sections. You have the option to provide new values for type, name, placeholder, class, default, etc.

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-billing-fields.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-billing-fields.jpg)

 

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-conditional-fields.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-conditional-fields.jpg)

 

## Conditional fields

Show fields based on parent field values and improve the checkout user experience.

#### Conditional parent

Select the conditional parent field and hide the current field based on the parent value.

#### Conditional parent value

Our system detects the parent field type and allows you select the value based on the available options.

[View demo](https://quadlayers.com/woocommerce-checkout-manager/checkout/?add-to-cart=32)

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-shipping-fields.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-shipping-fields.jpg)

 

## Remove    
checkout fields

You can easily remove the unnecessary fields and reduce the checkout form. Also, you can disable fields for certain products, product categories or user roles.

![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-user-order-upload.png)

 

## Upload files

The upload file type allows your users to upload any file type during the purchase process.

#### Edit uploaded files in admin dashboard

The shop manager can easily handle the files the users upload through the admin order dashboard.

#### Allow users to handle uploaded files

You can allow your users to handle their own uploaded files through the order section on the My Account page.

[View demo](https://quadlayers.com/woocommerce-checkout-manager/checkout/?add-to-cart=32)

## Edit uploaded    
files in the admin dashboard

The user can upload or delete fields from the order page.

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-admin-order-upload.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-admin-order-upload.jpg)

 

![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/woocommerce-checkout-manager-order-custom-fields.jpg)

 

## Show custom    
fields in order

You can include a section on the received order to display the values of the custom fields completed during the purchase process.

[![](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/woocommerce-checkout-manager-email-notifications.jpg)](https://quadlayers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/woocommerce-checkout-manager-email-notifications.jpg)

 

## Email notifications

Include custom fields in the email that the user receives after completing the purchase process.

#### Filter by order status

You can select the status of the order to display the custom fields.

#### Filter each field individually

You can disable the fields you don’t want to include in the emails.

[View demo](https://quadlayers.com/woocommerce-checkout-manager/checkout/?add-to-cart=32)

[Purchase Now](https://quadlayers.com/products/woocommerce-checkout-manager/#pricing)[Download free](https://quadlayers.com/checkout/?add-to-cart=85580&variation_id=118556)
